content: TE-H FM Flat chisels Ultra-robust flat chisel bits for chipping/channeling into concrete and masonry using the third-gen TE 3000 or H28 demolition tools with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these flat chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Better reliability – these flat chisels are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Applications Chiseling or chipping concrete, brick or block Shallower channeling in concrete For use with third-generation TE 3000 electric jackhammers and H28 demolition tools with clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) Width: 1.5 in Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Connection end | TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) | Width | 1.5 in | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2254778 - Flat chisel TE-H FM 40 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429838 - Flat chisel TE-H FM 40 - Package Size 1 pc - 2451885 - Flat chisel TE-H FM 40 MP3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Flat chisel TE-H FM 40 - 2254779 - Flat chisel TE-H FM 50 - Package Size 1 pc
